edu.jsu.mcis

Class NamedArgument

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.jsu.mcis.Argument
      • edu.jsu.mcis.NamedArgument

  • public class NamedArgument
extends Argument
    Named argument is an argument object that takes a name rather than a position. It can be called with --name or the short form flag -n.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class edu.jsu.mcis.Argument

        Argument.ArgType

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class edu.jsu.mcis.Argument

        argName, description, type, value, valueSet

      Returns the set of possible values that are allowed by that named argument object.

        public java.lang.String getDefaultValue()
        Returns the default value to be used if a value is not given. If for example --type is not called, the default value will be automatically put in its place.
        Returns:
        the default value to the named argument.
